title: DealX
summery: A full stack project using MERN stack. Here people can buy of sell old PC parts.Users will see role based interface.

details.name: DealX
details.overview: A full stack project using MERN stack. Here people can buy of sell old PC parts.Users will see role based interface.Below are some key features and technologies of this project.
points: This project is secure as it has authentication of firebase.
User can not visit private routes without logging in to the site.
User can see interface and take action based on their role.
A token generates every time a user logs in. To access sensitive data, the token needs to be verified from backend.
A buyer can book and pay products.If he faces any problem with any product, he can report it to admin.
Seller can add, advertise or delete his products.
An admin can see all buyers,all sellers and all reported products. He can delete any buyer,seller or reported product and he can verify any seller.
This project uses React.js, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, Firebase, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, JWT, and many npm packages as technologies,tools and frameworks.
The client site is hosted in firebase and server side is hosted in vercel
